name: Verbal Hugs
description:
Verbal Hugs is a character customization questionnaire meant to help create more dynamic characters, while also encouraging you to be good to yourself and others. It's inspired by the podcast All My Fantasy Children.

Special Thanks to Aaron Catano-Saez, Jeff Stormer, Nathan, and TJ

You can find more of TJ's work at https://twitter.com/TJmcFate
You can find All My Fantasy Children at https://twitter.com/AMFC_Podcast and http://oneshotpodcast.com/interview-discussion/all-my-fantasy-children/
